=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 6, col = 16)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 6, col = 16)

To determine the best action now, I'll analyze the current position and surroundings. 

The avatar is currently at (row = 6, col = 16), which has the following tile directly around it:
- Up (to row 5, col 16): empty (space)
- Down (to row 7, col 16): empty (space)
- Left (to row 6, col 15): empty (space)
- Right (to row 6, col 17): empty (space)

The avatar is in an area without any direct threats (death sprites) or immediate resources to collect. Since the last position did not change and there are multiple empty spaces to move to, I will choose to move the avatar down to (row = 7, col = 16).

This action aligns with the strategy of exploring the layout more, as moving down may allow for further navigation through an empty row towards potential resources or the exit later on.

``` Action:4 ``` 

The expectation here is that moving down will keep me safe and provide more options to further navigate the map.
